column4: I'm trying to install Ubuntu 7.10 on a friends computer but it hangs on boot? It's a Hp Pavillion dv6000 and 7.04 did the same. My sabayon live cd and vector cd worked so I'm not sure what I need to do to install Gutsy on it?
There is nothing special that needs to be done.. where is it hanging and what version do you have?
both 7.10 and 7.04 start to load and then just stop and go nowhere?
Thats  odd.. when you say they start to load, you can see any ubuntu images or the cd just  spins or what?
